movie_title: How to love, according to Rumi - Stephanie Honchell Smith
introduction: Explore the life and works of Rumi, who became one of the worldâ€™s most celebrated poets and mystical

vocabulary.example: The hurricane left behind an annihilating trail of destruction.

vocabulary.definition: possessing a compelling charm or attractiveness that inspires devotion in others
vocabulary.example: The charismatic leader captivated the audience with his powerful speech.

vocabulary.definition: having strong love, loyalty, or enthusiasm for someone or something
vocabulary.example: She was a devoted fan of the band, attending every concert they had.

vocabulary.definition: developed and improved over time, becoming more advanced or complete
vocabulary.example: His skills as a painter matured with each new artwork he created.

vocabulary.definition: expanding over a large area in an irregular or untidy way
vocabulary.example: The sprawling cityscape was a mix of modern skyscrapers and historic buildings.
The team's spirit was invincible, leading them to victory despite the odds.
